resources.string: All three of Giza\'s famed pyramids and their elaborate burial complexes were built during a frenetic period of construction, from roughly 2550 to 2490 B.C. The pyramids were built by Pharaohs Khufu (tallest), Khafre (background), and Menkaure (front). The Giza Pyramids, built to endure an eternity, have done just that.

is a medieval Islamic fortification in Cairo, Egypt. The location, on Mokattam hill near the center of Cairo, was once famous for its fresh breeze and grand views of the city. It is now a preserved historic site, with mosques and museums. In 1976, it was proclaimed by UNESCO as a part of the World Heritage Site Historic Cairo (Islamic Cairo) which was the new centre of the Islamic world, reaching its golden age in the 14th century.
Is a major souk in the historic center of Islamic Cairo. The bazaar district is one of Cairo\'s main attractions for tourists and Egyptians alike.

Is home to an extensive collection of ancient Egyptian antiquities. It has 120,000 items, with a representative amount on display, the remainder in storerooms. The edifice is one of the largest museums in the region

is a free-standing concrete tower located in Cairo, Egypt. At 187 m (614 ft), it has been the tallest structure in Egypt and North Africa for about 50 years. It was the tallest structure in Africa for 10 years, until 1971 when it was surpassed by Hillbrow Tower in South Africa.
Warm quarters with city views in a polished hotel offering 2 restaurants, a 24/7 bakery and a gym.

Overlooking the Nile River and just a 5-minute walk from the Cairo Museum, the Ramses Hilton boasts an elevated pool terrace heated in the winter, an on-site casino and gym. Guest rooms feature balconies offering Nile or panoramic city views.

Located in the Dokki neighborhood in Cairo, 9.7 km from Cairo International Conference Center (CICC), Sheraton Cairo Hotel and Casino features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has an outdoor pool and year-round outdoor pool, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Private parking is available on site.

Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at Nile Plaza is a beacon of Egyptian hospitality in a modern, dynamic city that stimulates the senses and soul. Rest easy in our luxurious Rooms and Suites high above the Nile at the heart of Cairo\'s social scene.
Great tea, great coffee, comfort place,good price range,very good for work, not very crowded, good service
Seattle-based coffeehouse chain known for its signature roasts, light bites and WiFi availability.

Great coffee, cappuccino and cafe caramelto are a favorite. The sandwiches are really good though usually the bread changes with the fillings so it ge ts confusing if you want a different bread for your favorite filling. However, they taste really good. Their cheese croissant and apple pie are amazing as well
This is a great place to sip mint tea, smoke Shisha and drink juice in the middle of the bustling Khan el Halili market. Just watch the people going by and listen to the sounds around you.

Indulge yourself to our daily menu with its wide variety of choices ranging from; our morning premium Breakfast products to the Delicious, freshly made Big Mac and Burgers, to our ever-popular Chicken sandwiches, McChickenÂ®, together with our top quality, World Famous Fries.
A place where you can get the best fried chicken in the world with the best flavors

Middle Eastern, Egyptian, Fast Food, Halal, Vegetarian Friendly. ... All reviews shawarma sandwiches pizza flat bread fava beans fries fast food english menu quick service egyptian food place is clean take away foul downtown egyptians takeaway.

Good traditional Egyptian food served warm or hot...main ingredients rice, lentils, macaroni, tomato sauce, fried onions, cumin, garlic vinegar. ... Koshary really was my new addiction on my trip to Egypt ...And Abou Tarek does about the best there is in Cairo.
